QuestData.Title: Young Twilight Scale
QuestData.Description:
<A partially-grown scale from a young twilight whelp.
More and more twilight dragons are appearing once again. This seems suspicious.
You should show the scale to Eryna above Grim Batol in the Wetlands, perhaps she has seen something recently.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the scale to Eryna above Grim Batol in the Wetlands.
